speaker: Mouse
text: It was the night before christmas, and all through the city, not a creature was stirring... except for a Mouse.

speaker: Hotdog Vendor
text: Take a seat, friend. You look down on your luck.

speaker: Hotdog Vendor
text: Another victim of the corp hegemony?

speaker: Mouse
text: <color="#999999">You nod.</color>

speaker: Hotdog Vendor
text: Who do you work for?

speaker: Mouse
text: Did. <color="#999999">You flash your useless Nisana ID.</color>

speaker: Hotdog Vendor
text: Of course. Hungry?

speaker: Mouse
text: <color="#999999">You nod again</color>

speaker: Hotdog Vendor
text: Toppings?

speaker: Mouse
text: <color="#999999">You shrug.</color>

speaker: Hotdog Vendor
text: The works then. On the house.

speaker: Hotdog Vendor
text: A good evening starts with a good hotdog friend.

speaker: Anarchist
text: Class C Security, huh. I'd be careful flashing that card around here. I overheard your predicament.

speaker: Anarchist
text: What did you do? Penetration? Diving? Exploiting? Wait, don't tell me. You have the eyes of a solo.

speaker: Anarchist
text: I have work for somebody like you. If you're interested, of course... Simple slurp and dash. Walk in, fiddle some slots, walk out.

speaker: Anarchist
text: Easy work.

speaker: Mouse
text: <color="#999999">At this point, what do you have to lose? You know.</color>

speaker: Anarchist
text: <color="#999999">He slides a note and a memory stick to you across the counter. The note is the name of a corp.</color>

speaker: Anarchist
text: Speak to Salie when you're ready. She can get you in the front door. The rest will be on you.

speaker: Anarchist
text: Take everything you can get your hands on. The more, the happier I'll be. Meet me back here once you're done.

speaker: Mouse
text: Security?

speaker: Anarchist
text: <color="#999999">He shrugs.</color>Do what you need to do.
